original_body_lines: A special group of 93 Japanese nationals including 16 children arrived in Sri Lanka on Saturday 29 July 2023 via SriLankan Airlines for a 5-day tour of Sri Lanka. During their stay they will be touring Negombo, Sigiriya and Kandy; experiencing the traditional Ayurvedic treatments at Ayurvie Sigiriya by Thema Collection. The group was welcomed at the Bandaranaike International Airport by Rowelmark Travels Chairman Dr. Ruwan Perera and Connaissance de Ceylan Group Travel Design by CDC Chairman and Managing Director Chandra Wickramasinghe along with other officials of both companies.
